website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the Adidas Marquee Boost Low is an outstanding performer. Wearers recommend the shoe for use in indoor and outdoor games, as well as for daily activities. The Boost cushioning is loved by a large number of ballers because of its unbeatable comfort. Besides these positive remarks, sneakerheads also seek to collect the shoe for its classic look. These kicks are also reported by the majority of reviewers as a possible contender for the top basketball shoes of 2018.
pros: A couple of players leave comments that the Adidas Marquee Boost Low is now their favorite performance shoes
These shoes go head to head with James Harden’s low-top third signature sneakers
A good number of wearers mention that the Boost midsole delivers a comfortable and springy feel
Several users report that they bought a second pair of these Adidas basketball shoes
They say the design and colorways are fresh and nice just like  the first Air Jordan basketball sneakers that buyers cannot get enough of
The lightness of the Marquee Boost Low makes a lot of buyers enjoy wearing the shoe
Most mention that these Adidas basketball shoes offer exemplary ankle support
Different courts do not have grip issues with the awesome herringbone traction pattern, say many wearers
cons: One baller reports that he is afraid to play using the Adidas Marquee Boost Low
He says the midsole sits high and his foot slips out of the footbed
A handful of shoppers claim that the design of these low-top basketball shoes is terrible

customer_reviews.title: A perfect non athletic athletic shoe. Style over function
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, though, not for working out. They're very comfortable as an everyday just hanging out shoe, but are too heavy for working out in. That said, I still give them a five because I knew what I was buying them for and for that they are perfect. The fit is a little stiff when you first put them on, but quickly loosens up. Love the style touches as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim DD

customer_reviews.title: Got blisters on the inside of both of my heels after 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks amazing, and I really wanted to keep them, but I had to return them because the part that offers ankle support inside the shoe felt like it was drilling into the inside of my heels with a metal string. They caused me the worst two blisters I've had in my entire life after just 30 minutes of playing ball. If you get them and they start drilling into you, stop immediately or else you'll get the same blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Corredor

customer_reviews.title: SKOL Vikings! Great sneakers!! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. Go Vikings! The only quarrel I have with these sneakers are that they arent the normal wide I'm use to. I wear Adidas sneakers because they are usually wide and me having a wide foot means that I dont have to buy EE. These are narrower than the shell toes i usually buy. That said i would go up a size when and if ordering to ensure you have enough room, if like me you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: jowanie and jamie

customer_reviews.title: It's a Basketball Shoe
customer_reviews.text: To begin, I'll say I don't ever expect a running shoe in a basketball shoe, but I did expect an added layer of comfort with what appeared as a substantial amount of boost foam. In short, it's still a quality shoe, but if you're expecting ultra boost comfort, keep looking. It's still a basketball shoe and it will still feel as such on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, fit perfectly, not too long at all. They look long because of the bottom boost sole, but otherwise the fit is perfect. Only slight negative which isnt exactly bad is they are very big and bulky seeming on my feet. Otherwise I love them
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: IT IS VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: ADIDAS MARQUEE BOOST BLUE/ORANGE SIZE 11 , I LIKE THIS COLOR AND CUSHION , SHOES LENGTH IS LITTLE BIT LONG BUT WIDTH IS FIT FOR ME. MANY REVIEWER SAID THIS SHOES ARE TIGHT FOR WIDTH AND LONG . I THINK SO TOO. IT IS LONG BUT I AM LUCKY CUZ I AM DON'T HAVE WIDE FOOT..BOOST CUSHION IS VERY COMFORTABLE . I WANNA RECOMMEND BUT TRY THE SHOES BEFORE PURCHASE IT IF IT'S POSSIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Young min Yang

customer_reviews.title: Amazon no for these shoes!😡
customer_reviews.text: Product looks alright but the item fits like 2 sizes up when compared to my other same size shoes! Not happy at all now I have to pay for gas to send the item back😡 to get a refund to order the shoes again. I’m scared to order smaller size cause those may be wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Janell Caster

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a pair of Adidas basket shoes last year ( size 11&1/2 ) Yet these, same size, are AT LEAST a 1/2 size too small
customer_reviews.author: TJC;ESQ

customer_reviews.title: There good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits as expected, and they are comfortable except that the tongue is to thin at the top and when i tighten my shoelaces they cause pain where the the tongue doesn't protect right above the foot.
customer_reviews.author: johndoe

customer_reviews.title: 6th man of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery on a dusty court, but other than that is very comfortable and fits to the size. Gets better the more you wear it, the bounce is serious. The grip is still great just wipe them and get back in the game! ( or clean the court!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ok.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but they are narrow. I took the insole out and now they fit perfectly also added a $1 cushioned insole for more durability.
customer_reviews.author: FLOYD L WILKERSON

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised when I looked at the shoes that the insides were not sewn together but trimmed to lay flat so as to let the foot push them out of the way. This made the fit uncertain,, As well the soles DID NOT GRIP the wooden basketball floor with any certainty.
customer_reviews.author: tim j.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fitting is uncomfortable for me. Even after 6 months of breaking in still having problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: the size is bigger than the other brand such as Nike
customer_reviews.text: Very good combat basketball shoes, the soles are very wear-resistant, the cushioning is also very good, including the feel of foot grabbing are also great. why the size is not the same as NIKE, I wear a 10.5 Nike, this Adidas 10.5 feels half a size larger, why Nike US10.5 equals UK9.5, while Adidas US10.5 equals UK10. I can't wear this to play basketball, I am going to give it to my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my brother and he loves the style and comfort
customer_reviews.author: angie delgado

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them for fashion not basketball. Really nice bright colors but more on the pink side
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected & in it's original package
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, fit as expected, very comfortable & great looking colors!
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Carazo

customer_reviews.title: Help ankles
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these bc his ankles hurt. Look good and work!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Size not right.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking shoe. Way too big for the size purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes overall
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - Good lockdown - good ankle support - cushioning is amazing CONS: - no arch support - the back of the shoe rubs your heel raw
customer_reviews.author: OG Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone else thought that these might be fake...? I have a few pairs of Adidas and they all fit true to size. These fit like a half size bigger. All sizes were also available when I ordered the 8 and right after I ordered the 8, everything went out of stock for majority of the sizes right after. Something shady going on here.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, larger than normal for Adidas but still wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon .Y

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value however my son seems to slip a little more on the court than with other shoes he has had.
customer_reviews.author: GoPackGo

customer_reviews.title: Sick Ass Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They’re high top so I don’t have to worry about them not giving me proper ankle support. I’m able to play in them just fine. Comfortable once they’ve been broken in. The colors are absolutely great too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 1/2 because most items that I was been buying were coming in too small. This item was too big and too bulky for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Deberry

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was too good to be true but it is true! They are great shoes. My son loves them and I'm glad to we bought them. Great price for a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martell

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that the bottom right front side left shoe where your toes vends it has a bump that bother you a little. I like that the shoes fit really tight and secure your ankles
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Basketball!!
customer_reviews.text: Pro shoe. Great fit. Great looking too. Must be laced all the way up when playing to prevent turning an ankle.
customer_reviews.author: LWS

customer_reviews.title: They look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great! Very flashy! Not the best for all day walking though. They can feel tight at times. Not a work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Hard on the ankles
customer_reviews.text: Love the style but sprained my ankle the first time I tried playing in them
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Killer shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. I loce Adidas and this high top is killer. Grear fit and great look.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Horning

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, no traction!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe. Comfortable. A disturbing lack of grip on certain hardwood surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mieskolainen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and value
customer_reviews.text: I’m still in the process of wearing the shoes in, but the fit is perfect and it’s real value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Randell Man

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks big on the outside but the fit is perfect. Excellent for outdoor basketball on concrete courts.
customer_reviews.author: kwame gittens

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for basketball the boost foam works wonder for my knees
customer_reviews.author: luiss

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Very nice but package without original box
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 shoes both 11us.1of them comes without original box and price tag .I opened a case for return and refund. But 1 still fine. but 2 shoes are good And I hope order agains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes 3rd pair of this style - nice fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable sneaker, and it is a lot nicer in person. I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable, not stylish, not bouncy like other boost outsoles, not supportive...not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kluettke

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a little tight, I should have maybe ordered a size up, but overall, they’re really nice
customer_reviews.author: Dennis O.

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter wears these for basketball. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Beck

customer_reviews.title: Style and Price is RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with the product it feel great and looks good. I love getting my shoes and sneakers from amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good looking basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Finally a basketball shoe that doesn't look like a clown shoe. I've never had an issue with Adidas. Great grip and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson K Ward

customer_reviews.title: It would be stupid not to buy these
customer_reviews.text: These are fresh! Fit perfectly and have that brand new shoes smell. It’s almost a crime to put them on my feet. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bobby ThrillZ

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Our son is wearing these for basketball and said they are comfy and great traction.
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically for cardio work outs with lateral movements. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Standout time!
customer_reviews.text: I love these kicks because they're different and stand out!
customer_reviews.author: Rome.erv

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe does look as good in person and the fit is tighter than I like.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Dixon

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Marquee Boost Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: A classic look gets upgraded with modern details. These men's basketball shoes are built for quickness and agility on the hardwood. They have a molded ankle collar with a cushioned heel for support and comfort. A responsive midsole returns energy on every jumper while the herringbone outsole provides extra grip as you stop and go on a dime.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper; Molded and padded ankle collar
boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
